Directions: Base your answer to the following questions on the information and graph below and on your knowledge of science.
Content: An equal number of two types of tomato plants (a normal one and a genetically modified one) were planted in five different garden plots. The genetically modified plants produce a protein that kills caterpillars when the plant is eaten. Each plant received the same amount of water daily. The graph below shows the actual number of damaged tomatoes in each of the five garden plots for both the normal plants and genetically modified plants.
